What's diffenent in B18 update : +Max Vault capacity : 170000 -> 230000 -Vault subscription fee : 1000 -> 850 +Initial Warehouse capacity : 2000kg -> 3000kg +Max Warehouse capacity : 10000kg -> 15000kg *Fixed a bug that there are -2 notes in a vault after a transfer *Notification letter types remade
Meat and potatoes are everywhere, but fridge's nowhere? Spend 10 yrs on traveling from the north pole to the source on foot? Food crisis breaks out on your caravan, and no gas station nearby?
You need this mod -- RimSilo™ (and its prerequisite RimBank)!
-Secure Vault, store your money here in bulk! -A Warehuse preventing the goods from deteriorating! -Reliable but inexpensive Static Chamber, get your wounds frozen! -Global DropPod Delivery Service, send everything (stored above) or raid every settlement! -With one account, store or fetch your items at any place -- even at enemy base! (Beacon required) -Drop supplies for your caravan...Or even drop the whole caravan onto a friendly faction base! -Transfer currency, items, or even animals, prisoners and colonists between two maps! -A more flexible solution than Quantum Storage! (Sorry, but you didn't update it to A17 X( )
-And incredibly detailed introductions, guides, tips and FAQs!
Gameplay Hints (Only examples) -Store money into the vault to reduce the size of potential raids! -Warehouse with lots of food or ingredients = an enormous fridge! -Store items or minified furnitures into the warehouse, and retrieve them at your new base! -Deliver goods to your caravans by droppods! -Or just drop your whole caravan onto a friendly faction base! (Then come back on foot, or with Set-Up Camp) -Put your soldiers into Static Chambers and strike the enemies with an orbital drop! (Remember to drop firearms as well) -And put prisoners into chambers then bring them back! -Luciferium's out of stock? Freeze the consumer in a chambers until you get enough!
Extra Features -Add it to your game at any time! Opening a new save is NOT required. -Remove it from your game at any time without corrupting your saves! (See below)
HowTo 1.Load this mod after RimBank (the prerequisite mod). 2.Select a colonist and right-click the ATM Terminal (From RimBank), then select "RimSilo™ Professional Storing Service" in the float menu to access the UI. 3.When trying to remove this mod, please open the UI from the terminal first, then select "Delete Account" from "Misc...". If there are any active sub mods (of this), please make sure all the removing commands for those sub mods have been executed.
PS. Select a colonist and right-click the ATM Terminal, then select "RimSilo™ Professional Storing Service" in the float menu to access the UI. PS2. If you get stuck while solving a payment, try to stop your mouse over icons or titles - A tooltip will emerge and lead the way. PS3. Almost all the operations in this mod need at least one active orbital trade beacon, just like what you should do when trading with a tradership in the vanilla game. PS4. (That was a joke in RuntimeGC) PS5. If you have any questions, check Info button ("i" icons) on the UI, or look up in the "FAQs" from the "Misc...". It's not a bad idea that you check help contents before spending money, right? PS6. The coremod of RimBank Series (aka this mod) and all sub mods must have the same MinorVersion number. Well if you cannot figure out what I'm talking about, just ignore it, a built-in ModChecker will take charge of it. PS7. Post any errors or bugs on my forum thread or Steam workshop page.Your effort contributes to a better mod.Thanks!
And let me introduce 3 authors (contributors) of this mod (Label's not wide enough XD). user19990313(ArchAuthor,Dll parts), WishingLaws(En translation), duduluu(Preview.png)
<size=20>RimSilo™边缘仓储™</size> [子mod，必须排在Rimbank边缘银行之后加载]
<size=11>*免责声明：在本mod任何语言翻译的文本中出现的[™]标记仅做仿真之用，不表示任何形式的企业注册商标、产权或其他。若您认为该标记确实对您的权益产生损害，请提交书面材料通知作者，作者将立刻进行修改。若您开始使用本mod，视为您同意了上述声明。</size>
B18更新內容： +保险库容量上限：170000 -> 230000 -保险库扩容手续费：1000 -> 850 +仓库初始容量：2000kg -> 3000kg +仓库容量上限：10000kg -> 15000kg *修复了可能导致保险库钞票为-2的bug *缴费通知更换了信封类型
满地干肉饼，冷库完全没地方堆？ 从南极去北极，徒步要走十几年？ 远行队半路断粮，前不着村后不着店？
只要一个mod——RimSilo™边缘仓储™（以及前置RimBank边缘银行）就够了！
-超大容量的保险库，安全存放你的白银和电子钞票！ -防止货物老化的仓库，成吨贮存你的原料吧！ -廉价却可靠的冷冻舱，伤病冻结！ -全球空投服务，无限距离！把上面存放的物品空投到任何地方，或者骑任何基地的脸！ -一个账户全球通用，在任何地方收发你的货物——甚至在敌方基地里！ -投放物资补给远行队...或者干脆把远行队空投到友好派系基地交易！ -在地图与地图间转移现金、物资乃至动物、囚犯、殖民者！ -比量子储存更灵活，却只需要一个终端、一个信标！
-还有超详尽的指导、说明、提示、FAQ，更多细节等你发掘！
玩法指路（仅供参考） -把货币存进保险库，降低袭击强度！ -用仓库装食材，充当临时冷库！ -把家当（和卸载的家具）塞进仓库，在新基地取出来，轻松搬家！ -远行队走商不带货物，到达目的地时再空投过去！ -或者干脆把整支远行队空投到目的地！（然后走回来，不过你可以和Set-Up Camp配合） -把战士装进冷冻舱，轨道空降袭击敌人！（记得带武器） -占领基地后再把囚犯塞进冷冻舱送回基地！ -路西法合剂断供？把成瘾者送进冷冻舱，有药时再回来！
额外特性 -可中途加入存档，无需开新档 -可中途移除，不会损坏存档（见下）
如何使用 1.加载这个mod（必须在RimBank边缘银行mod之后） 2.在游戏中选中一个殖民者，右键“ATM终端”（来自RimBank边缘银行mod），在悬浮菜单里点击“边缘仓储™管理界面”即可访问本mod内容。 3.若要中途移除该mod，请打开本mod的UI界面，点击“杂项...”并在悬浮菜单中选择“删除账户”。如果加载了这个mod的子mod，请确其保所有子mod的移除程序已经被运行过。
PS. 选中一个殖民者，右键ATM终端，在悬浮菜单里点击“边缘仓储™管理界面”以打开UI。 PS2. 调整支付比例的UI中隐藏着各种提示，如果你遇到了不懂的地方，试着把鼠标悬停在图标或标题上——你能看到提示框。 PS3. 本mod所有物品存取都需要“轨道交易信标”（而且别忘了通电）。 PS4. （老梗了，我在RuntimeGC就玩过了） PS5. 有问题就多看看UI上的信息图标（字母“i”）以及“其他..”里的“FAQ（常见问题解答）”。花钱之前仔细看说明可不是什么坏事。 PS6. 这是子mod，必须在RimBank边缘银行（主mod）之后加载，必须和主mod版本相同。如果你真的搞不懂我在说啥，mod里内置了一个检查器，有问题只要按照指示来就行了。 PS7. 请将任何此mod导致的bug或冲突贴到贴吧发布页上（或者Ludeon论坛，或者Steam页面），这将使mod更加完善。谢谢！
最后感谢本mod三位作者和贡献者（没办法，写在作者那行写不开） user19990313（作者，dll编写），天上掉下来个劳伦斯（中译英），风之起灵（预览图）
